title: Lanyard Ceremony
description: The IEEE-DBIT student chapter organized a Lanyard Ceremony on the 15th of February 2020. This event was organized to formally introduce the students in the new core group of the IEEE-DBIT student branch and to distribute the newly made lanyards. The newly formed core group, along with some former core members and faculty members of the EXTC branch and the H.O.D, werepresent for this event.
